title: 12 June 14
content:
--- title: "12 June '14" kind: article created_at: 2014-06-12 17:10:58 UTC author: Niharika (Bug reporting system) image: https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/5735280?s=50 categories: GSoC-2014 tags: "news bug-reporting-system python django" layout: post ---

What I did today:

  • Created models and views for django based form, removed the HTML one
  • Database connectivity to save form data to database
  • Tested the form

What I left with, in the big picture:

  • Saving JS fetched data to database
  • Styling the form
  • Saving the screenshots
  • Creating the admin end
Originally posted on Niharika Kohli
